pullrequest.title: Serialize components based on ignition::msgs with the default serializer

content.raw: LGTM, but I'm just wondering why put this in the default serializer instead of creating a custom serializer under `Serialization.hh`. This would keep the top-level default serializer cleaner without extra 3rd party dependencies.
content.html: LGTM, but I'm just wondering why put this in the default serializer instead of creating a custom serializer under Serialization.hh. This would keep the top-level default serializer cleaner without extra 3rd party dependencies.
